page.title: 02PRINCE'S GOLF COURSE
page.content:
{Prince's Golf Club}at Sandwich is situated inside the wide sweep of {Sandwich Bay.} The grass is fine in texture, and the fairways maintain their springiness throughout the year. It has 27 holes of championship standard. Less skilful players can play the course too and take advantage of the excellent teaching facilities. Prince's has a large practice area and professionals who give instruction at moderate charges of Â£5 per six lessons.
The original course had been begun in 1904 under the direction of{Sir Harry {Mallaby-Deeley}and was opened in 1907. Seven years later it was taken over for coastal defence and military training. It was not made available for golf until after the end of the First World War. {
